title: Beamtimes and Lifetimes: The World of High Energy Physicists
description: The unique breed of particle physicists constitutes a community of sophisticated mythmakersâ€•explicators of the nature of matter who forever alter our views of space and time. But who are these people? What is their world really like? Sharon Traweek, a bold and original observer of culture, opens the door to this unusual domain and offers us a glimpse into the inner sanctum.
author: Sharon Traweek
